$wpApiStatuses
service in module wp-api-angularjs

Description

statuses entity

Dependencies

  • $injector

Methods

  • get(statusesName, params, data, headers)

    Get a specific statuses by its ID

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    statusesNamestring

    The statuses name

    paramsobject

    Optional: {Object.} – Map of strings or objects which will be appended as GET parameters.

    dataobject

    Optional: {string|Object} – Data to be sent as the request message data.

    headersobject

    Optional: {Object} – Map of strings or functions which return strings representing HTTP headers

    Returns
    Object

    Promise

  • getList(params, data, headers)

    Get statuses list

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    paramsobject

    Optional: {Object.} – Map of strings or objects which will be serialized with the paramSerializer and appended as GET parameters.

    dataobject

    Optional: {string|Object} – Data to be sent as the request message data.

    headersobject

    Optional: {Object} – Map of strings or functions which return strings representing HTTP headers to send to the server. If the return value of a function is null, the header will not be sent. Functions accept a config object as an argument.

    Returns
    Object

    Promise

    Example

    $wpApiStatuses.getList({});
